banner.title: We use cookies.

modal.title: Manage your cookie preferences.
modal.essential.title: Essentials
modal.essential.desc: These are required for the website to work, like remembering your privacy settings, keeping you logged in, or enabling secure payments.
modal.performance.title: Performance
modal.performance.desc: These help us understand how people use our site (like which pages are most popular) so we can make improvements.
modal.personalization.title: Personalization
modal.personalization.desc: These allow the site to remember your preferences (such as language or region) and provide enhanced features.
modal.advertising.title: Advertising & Targeting
modal.advertising.desc: These are used to deliver ads more relevant to you, limit how often you see them, and measure campaign performance.
modal.footer.pre: You can always change these settings later via our
modal.footer.post: page, or via the cookie widget placed at the bottom left of the page.
